titles: A Christen exhortacion vnto customable swearers What a ryght [and] lawfull othe is: whan, and before whom, it owght to be. Item. The maner of sayinge grace, or geuynge thankes vnto God.
author: Coverdale, Miles, 1488-1568.
Bale, John, 1495-1563, attributed name.
publisher: Printed by the widow of C. Ruremond,
notes: By Miles Coverdale. Sometimes attributed to John Bale.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
